about_the_game:
This game is a derivative work of the Touhou Project by "Shanghai Alice Illusionary Orchestra".

The story takes place between the 13th (Touhou Shinreibyou) and 14th (Touhou Kishinjou) of the Touhou Project.
Come along if you're good at danmaku or not.
The genre this time is card battle.
It's the usual incident investigation, so it might be good for people who are new to Touhou.
There are over 100 playable characters and about 20 hours of play time.
If you turn on the full expansion function, there will be over 200 characters and the play time will be infinite!?
And so, Midori Budoden enters Gensokyo.

・Synopsis
The usual lazy and carefree Gensokyo.
One day, Reimu feels something is off about a danmaku game that starts for no particular reason.
It's a battle that is more like a brawl than a danmaku game, with multiple people fighting with fists, kicks, and weapons.
Something is wrong, Reimu thinks, so she sets off on a journey to investigate the strangeness of the danmaku game.

・Controls, etc.
Basically only use the mouse. (If you're not good at it, you can also use ↑↓ENTER)
Autosaves after each scenario is cleared.

・A nostalgic yet new card battle game

Battle using the six types of cards dealt to you!
You've seen this somewhere before? You're just imagining it!

・The basis of battle is the number on the card

The number written on the card has a big impact on the damage.
It's just like this, except for the Chinese numerals (defense value) in the bottom right.

・Decidue it with ☆1, a fatal blow!

☆ is the highest number and means 8.
In other words, if you enter with ☆1, the damage will be the maximum.

・Rank isn't everything

Gensokyo is a society of inequality. There is a clear hierarchy of
Because this is Budo battle. If you're not careful, this kind of overthrow will happen.

・But the strong are strong

Even the strong will lose if they throw away their wisdom, but if the strong have wisdom, they are like a hammer to a demon.
The strong are strong.

・Intervene in card luck

Leave cards to luck? 　Use assists to get the cards you want.
We are now in an era where luck is not something you leave to the heavens, but something you control yourself.
Each character has a unique assist that gives you an advantage in battle.
The combination of assists and character abilities creates infinite possibilities in battle.

・BGM is mainly free material
Unfortunately, I couldn't hire an arranger, so the BGM is mainly free material.
However, I tried to carefully select the best ones instead. Please listen to it.
In addition, this game is free because of that.

・Changing screen size, etc.
Full screen or window: Right click during the game
BGM and sound effect volume, etc.: Right click during the game
Screen size: Right click in library → Properties → Installed files → Browse and launch the environment settings.exe that appears

・Whether or not to make videos and live commentary
Feel free to do so.
However, please be aware of the terms of use of the video site.

name: 緑葡萄伝（東方Project・幻想葡萄伝）

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10 / 8 / 7 / Vista / XP
  • Processor: Pentium 2GHz以上
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 不明
  • Storage: 850 MB available space

short_description: Friendship! Effort! And victory! This is the ultimate battle formula! Even NORMAL is difficult, but there are difficulties VERY HRAD! Climb up! There are two peaks of boobs, but there is only one peak of grapes! ...Oh, if you find it too difficult, you can take your time and clear it on VERY EASY.
